alert.note: Alert for Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 25 at 5:32PM MDT until March 25 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FALL RIVER COUNTY... At 532 PM MDT, a dangerous snow squall was located 9 miles south of Oelrichs, or 19 miles northwest of Chadron, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous travel. Several inches of snow have fallen on Highway 385 south of Oelrichs. Motorist should expect poor road conditions near the state line. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
